title: ShowFileRequestHandle should allow you to specify which files can be viewed, not just which cannot be viewed
description: In many cases I wouldn't want to come up with every file I want hidden - especially when new files may be added in the future - often you would want to explicitly say which files can be viewed - this is how the old gettableFiles used to work.
